events.comment: after few sec go to splash
At the beginning play sound and set the logo to be in the middle of the screen and set the opacitity of the logo to 0
Increase the opacitity of the logo
If the opacity of the logo >= 100, change the scene...
LOAD MUSIC STATE to check if music is on or off
start playing the background music is music state is on

objects.name: left_hand_controls
objects.string:
Move forward: W
Turn Left: A
Turn Right: D
Shoot: Space

objects.name: right_hand_controls
objects.string:
Move forward: I
Turn Left: J
Turn Right: L
Shoot: Space

events.comment: set fx and music volume slider
set aseroid text to display number of asteroids to be spawn
Create some asteroids to display in the background
if music is not played, then play it
if music is not played, then play it
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
set color of material gui objects
hide the mouse just to make sure it not in the view
Set player to be in the middle of the screen and set a random angle
set initial values for player ship
make sure the asteroids and player are not colliding
global timer to count how long the player survive
set position andscale of weapon, shield and hull indicator
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
bullet is in collision with asteroid, create 2 medium asteroid and delete the larg asteroid and the bullet
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
bullet is in collision with asteroid, create 3 small asteroid and delete the medium asteroid and the bullet
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
bullet is in collision with asteroid, create some debrish, delete the small asteroid and the bullet
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
delete debrish once the opacity is low
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
delete debrish once the opacity is low
if player is not destroyable, make it destroyable after few sec
if player is destroyed, but the engine thruster sound is still playing, play the thruster down sound
set player position in case it is outside the screen
player is in collision with any mineral, mark it as collected and increase the number
player is in collision with any asteroids, activate shield
if shield got no more power, decrease hull integrity
update scale of hull integrity bar
if shield got no more power, and inegrity is gonem destroy ship
if player is no longer present (destroyed), move debrish
move minerals toward the gui sprites
if mineral and gui sprite is in collision, update text and delete mineral sprite
if ship is not in collision, then hide it
if player is in collision with asteroid, update scale of shield power bar
if ship is destroyed then hide it
if run out of shield power, hide it
play hull damage sound effect if hull integrity is decreasing
stop sound effect if player is destroyed
stop the sound if player is no longer in collision
If player is dead and all player debrish outside the screen, go to next scene
If all asteroids are destroyed, save mineral and go to next scene
in case all minerals collected, immediately go to the next scene
in case a few minerals left in the scene, wait few seconds and go to the next scene
If not all alseroids is destroyed display message FAILED and number of asteroid destroyed and time

parameters: "You have destroyed only " + ToString(GlobalVariable(asteroid_count)) + " asteroids in:"
ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: If all asteroids destroyed, display message Complete all asteroids destroyed! and time

parameters: ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: If high score is stored before
check if the current asteroid number is greater or equal to the one stored before
If it greater NEW HIGH SCORE!
save new high score and update the texts

parameters: ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: if it equal, check if the time is less
if the current hour is less than the saved hour NEW HIGH SCORE!
save new high score and update the text

parameters: ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: if hour is equal but the minute is less then NEW HIGH SCORE
save new high score and update the text

parameters: ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: if hour and minute is equal but the second is less then NEW HIGH SCORE
save new high score and update the text

parameters: ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: if the time is not less then just display the high score

parameters: ToString(Variable(hs_hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(Variable(hs_minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(Variable(hs_second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: If asteroid number is less just display the old high score

parameters: ToString(Variable(hs_hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(Variable(hs_minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(Variable(hs_second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: If no high score is stored before, just save current score and display high score

parameters: ToString(GlobalVariable(hour)) + VariableString(hour_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(minute)) + VariableString(minute_t) + " " + ToString(GlobalVariable(second)) + VariableString(second_t)

events.comment: if player made no score, save nothing just display the messages
